definitions.definition: A person employed to remove the wool from animals, such as sheep. using shears.
A person employed in a roller mill to shear off the uneven side of the hot metal plate .
A piece of industrial equipment used to grind up long shafts of coal in underground mines.

main_definition: A person employed to remove the wool from animals, such as sheep. using shears.
secondary_definitions: A person employed in a roller mill to shear off the uneven side of the hot metal plate .
A piece of industrial equipment used to grind up long shafts of coal in underground mines.
